text:
a man and a woman looking at the camera: Prince William his wife Catherine spoke to two women who are clinically vulnerable and eligible for first Covid-19 jabs soon
¬© Aamir QURESHI
Prince William his wife Catherine spoke to two women who are clinically vulnerable and eligible for first Covid-19 jabs soon
Prince William has warned that anti-vaccination messages are rife on social media and urged those eligible to get jabs, following a similar appeal by his grandmother, Queen Elizabeth II.

"Social media is awash sometimes with lots of rumours and misinformation," the Duke of Cambridge said in video footage released by Kensington Palace on Saturday evening.

It showed him and his wife Catherine, the Duchess of Cambridge, speaking to two women who are clinically vulnerable and eligible for first jabs soon.

In one video call, a woman called Shivali, who has type 2 diabetes, said she had read a lot of social media posts that made her "a bit nervous" about getting vaccinated initially, while she was now confident about getting the jab.

The prince told her: "We have to be a little bit careful who we believe and where we get our information from, especially for those who are clinically vulnerable as well, it's so important that these vaccinations are done."

"Catherine and I are not medical experts by any means but if it's any consolation we can wholeheartedly support having vaccinations, it's really, really important." 


Video: Britain's Queen Elizabeth says her Covid vaccination shot was painless (NBC News)

Vaccine uptake so far has been "amazing," the prince said, while the task now is to ensure that younger generations "feel that it's really important for them to have it."

The video came after the 94-year-old Queen on Thursday urged people to take up the vaccine, saying it "didn't hurt at all," when she received it in January, along with Prince Philip.

She said that those who feared getting the vaccine, "ought to think about other people rather than themselves."

Her eldest son and heir, Prince Charles, 72, who contracted a mild dose of Covid-19 last year, has also received his jab, as has his second wife, Camilla, 73.

The royal family is speaking out as health officials have voiced concerns over lower take-up among ethnic minority communities. 

The UK so far has given more than 19 million people a first vaccine dose after launching its innoculation programme in December.

text:
Want to help save the planet?  Here are 6 things every individual can do to save the Earth:
1.  Go VEGAN (food, clothes, accessories, toiletries, furniture etc.)
2.  Consume products LESS and become an INFORMED consumer.  
   -  Don't buy anything new (except if necessary, like medicine or contact lenses).  You can buy basically everything USED or make it yourself.  
   -  Do your RESEARCH before buying anything.  Many products are destroying the environment via the extraction of raw materials, the production process, transportation etc.  Also production lines are full of human labor abuses.  Do your RESEARCH if you must buy something.  Remember, your purchase of a product acts to support that company and everything that went into that product.
   - If you don't know 100% how a product was made at each and every step, then do NOT buy the product.  You could be unknowingly supporting the extinction of orangutans in Indonesia (ex. palm oil) or the destruction of the Amazon Rainforest (ex. beef).  No joke.  Stop buying products unless you are 100% informed.  Don't be selfish.  You  don't need most products.  Buy it used at eBay/Craigslist/Goodwill or make it yourself instead of contributing to the destruction of the planet.
          - Check if the product has any certifications, such as:  RainforestAlliance, FairTrade, RSPO - Roundtable on Sustainable Palm Oil, USDA Organic etc.
   - Stop buying via Amazon!!!  It has rampant human rights abuses that have been clearly reported on many times, including abuses and neglect during COVID-19.  In addition, despite some of its 'climate pledges', Amazon has a terrible negative impact on the environment.  Think factories, energy-usages, packing for all of those boxes, carbon emissions for the trucks that deliver them etc.  If you buy via Amazon you are supporting human rights abuses and environmental degradation.  Do you really need that product?  Just buy it used or at least directly form the actual company.  Don't be selfish, be responsible.
3.  Go plastic and packaging free.  Don't buy anything with non-compostable packaging, or that's made of non-environmental material.  If you do, make sure it's recyclable and recycle it properly.
4.  ADOPT and REDUCE family sizes.  Humans have overpopulated the world and are destroying the environment as a result.  The human population is almost at 8 billion.  We need to intelligently and voluntarily work to get our numbers down to at least half of that.  It is a very personal issue, but please consider adopting children instead of creating new children.  If having biological children, consider smaller family sizes.  
   - Donate money and/or volunteer at organizations that support women's rights and literacy.  On average, women's illiteracy rates are inverse to the number of children they have.  I.e. the number of children a woman has decreases as she becomes literate and more educated.  Here are some ideas:  Room to Read, World Literacy Foundation, Malala Fund, UNICEF, Campaign for Female Education (CAMFED), Afghan Institute of Learning, Invest in Girls, Educate Girls, AGE Africa, Asante Africa Foundation, She‚Äôs the First, Forum for African Women Educationalists (FAWE).
5. VOTE and become politically informed.  Make sure to stay politically informed and pressure your local, state and national representatives to support issues and legislation that save and protect the environment and species.  VOTE during elections.
6. Use only RENEWABLE energy and use LESS of it.  
   - Buy carbon offsets from a reliable company for your yearly energy usage.
   - Stop flying unless absolutely necessary (and buy carbon offsets if you do).  Walk, bike, ride a velomobile, use public transportation instead of gas-powered cars.
   - See if your energy company has an option for you to buy green energy or support green energy initiatives.
   - Install your own renewable energy sources, like solar panels.
   - Be conscious throughout your day and use as little energy as possible.  Ex. instead of turning on the heat, just wear a few more layers and close the windows.

We can save the planet if everyone just does their part.  Everyone please act!

Check out this presentation for more information on human impacts on the environment and what you can do to help:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YP83Qz6TabM

text:
Did Bill Gates Test Unapproved Vaccines on Children in Africa?    
"Microsoft co-founder Bill Gates, through his foundation, has spent billions of dollars on health initiatives in developing countries, and amid the coronavirus pandemic has pledged funding for seven pharmaceutical factories so that when a coronavirus vaccine is approved, production can start more quickly. Those actions have opened him to claims that vaccination projects that his foundation funded had nefarious intentions.        
In several viral tweets last week, Candace Owens, an author and conservative provocateur, accused Gates and the World Health Organization of experimenting with vaccines on children in Africa and India:   [samples of tweets displayed in this article]      
The claims have also made their way into Facebook groups where anti-quarantine protests have been organized.    
The ‚Äúacademic review‚Äù linked to in Owens‚Äôs tweet is titled ‚ÄúAccountability of International NGOs: Human Rights Violations in Healthcare Provision in Developing Countries and the Effectiveness of Current Measures‚Äù and is authored by Sharmeen Ahmed, who was at the time the a student at the Golden Gate University School of Law. The article was published by The Annual Survey of International & Comparative Law, a journal published by Golden Gate students and faculty. 
The Ahmed article relies on findings from a report by Indian Parliament‚Äôs Standing Committee on Health and Family that itself includes misinformation. The committee asserted, among other things, that PATH had not properly registered as a legal entity when it began working in India. However, this effort began well before the HPV vaccine project, and PATH had the proper documentation by May 2009. The biggest concern with the project turned out to be improperly filed consent forms‚Äîsome forms lacked witness signatures, while others did not have dates, and a few did not have signatures that matched the names on the form. There were also worries that because of the low literacy rate in some areas in which the vaccine was distributed, some parents of participants may not have fully understood the form they signed. In all, the standing committee reprimanded PATH, but the organization is still allowed to operate in India, as is the Gates Foundation. Presumably, Owens‚Äôs claims of ‚Äúinfertilizing‚Äù are about the HPV vaccine, though the CDC states ‚Äúthere is no current evidence that HPV vaccines cause reproductive problems in women.‚Äù Ahmed claims that the Malaria Vaccine Initiative ‚Äúresulted in 151 deaths and caused serious adverse effects, including paralysis and seizure in 1048 of 5949 children aged 5-17 months.‚Äù This claim results from a massive misreading of the results of the initiative, which recorded all deaths of participants and their causes. Many of the causes‚Äîlike HIV infection, drowning, and measles‚Äîobviously cannot be linked to vaccination. (You can see the full lists of causes of death in Table 11 of this document.) None of the deaths were linked to the vaccine.   
The claim of paralysis and seizure is similarly misrepresented: 1,048 children in the age group in question reported ‚Äúserious adverse events‚Äù after taking the vaccine. It‚Äôs important to note that ‚Äúserious adverse events‚Äù is not the same thing as ‚Äúserious adverse effects‚Äù; participants were asked to track all serious health changes they saw post-vaccination, the vast majority of which are unrelated to the vaccine. (You can see the full list of serious adverse events in Table 3 of this document.) Only 10 children from the ages of 5 months to 17 months months had side effects caused by the vaccine, reporting 12 events: ‚Äú7 seizures, 3 episodes of pyrexia [fever], 1 episode of myositis [muscle inflammation], and 1 injection-site reaction.‚Äù Three children in that age group experienced side effects: ‚Äú1 injection-site reaction, 1 episode of pyrexia, and 1 episode of febrile convulsion [a convulsion caused by fever].‚Äù All children who experienced seizures recovered, and paralysis was not reported as a side effect, or even a serious adverse event, by any of the participants. Additionally, no parties raised ethical concerns about the initiative and it was declared a success after the vaccine was found to reduce the number of infant malaria cases by a third."   See the full investigation complete with many hyperlinks to various evidence at: https://factcheck.thedispatch.com/p/did-bill-gates-test-unapproved-vaccines

text:
¬†@Narrow Pather¬† CLAIM:  Ongoing tetanus vaccine campaigns in Kenya are a ruse to sterilize women of childbearing age.  FALSE  "In October 2014, a group of concerned Catholic bishops in Kenya released a statement claiming a tetanus vaccine program aimed at women entering or in their childbearing years was in actuality a stealth attempt to sterilize women en masse for unstated reasons.  
Dr. Ngare‚Äôs forced choice between the doctors or the Kenyan government neglects a third possibility: someone, somewhere is sincere but mistaken. His statement about the timing of vaccinations in respect to the earliest age women can marry in Kenya is a good illustration of fallacious thinking ‚Äî since the vaccine is given in a five-shot series, beginning administration three years prior to marrying age makes more sense than exposing women who are married but not yet immunized to losing children to tetanus.

The expressed concerns of Ngare and bishops in Kenya are the same as false rumors circulated over two decades ago in several other countries (Mexico, Tanzania, Nicaragua, and the Philippines) where the WHO and UNICEF undertook tetanus vaccination programs:

Rumours have circulated recently in Mexico, Tanzania, Nicaragua, and the Philippines that WHO and UNICEF are using women as guinea pigs to test a contraceptive vaccine given to them under the guide of tetanus toxoid vaccine. These rumours, apparently initiated by so-called ‚Äòpro-life‚Äô groups, are completely untrue. The vaccines do not contain contraceptive vaccines of any other substance which interferes with fertility of pregnancy and their labeling accurately describes their actual contents. The false claims made by these groups have had an adverse impact on immunisation programmes in all four countries."  https://www.snopes.com/fact-check/tetanus-vaccine-sterilization/

text:
Why is no one asking, how does investment into public health resources affect death rates per country? How can we compare countries who have all invested different amounts into their health systems as if it is one homogenised health system world wide and it is the virus and peoples actions that dictate the severity. This may be one component but a huge variable is the investment in health per country (availability of ICU beds, ambulance resources, payment of workers and amount of health workers in the system). Take, for example, Greece. Where it is well known they have not invested enough into their public system for years, have problems with citizens paying taxes etc and there aren't enough resources to handle pressure on the system, meaning a greater need for lockdowns, not because of virus outbreak severities, but because a smaller outbreak in greece compared to say, Germany, who have a much more robust public system, puts a greater strain on the country and resources and risks higher complications and death rates. I am kind of shocked nobody is asking this question, it is a moment where can really isolate which countries have not invested in their health care systems and hold them to accountability and try and fix the problem for the future! And most importantly find an answer to why they didnt invest or prepare for public health emergencies that have been modelled for years. 

Rather than focus on the remedy and vaccinations, which is one part of solving the pandemic and most importantly future pandemic response, why are we not doing a stringent audit on public health investment? This also brings in the question, how has years of tax fraud and tax evasion by globalist companies contributed to a drop in investment in infrastructure from so much money being brought offshore into tax havens when it should be circulating in local economies, and used for things like health infrastructure, transport infrastructure, education infrastructure and so on. Has anybody measured the consequence of tax evasion by large corporations and that maybe we are needing such extreme measures because for years there has been more and more money that should be going into public infrastructure through taxation, going outside of countries and into the hands of globalist elites. It is a fair question. Not a conspiracy. These are the important questions I think we should answering right now. Not how can we vaccinate everyone and go back to a destructive infinite growth economy that was anyway pushing us closer and closer to ecological collapse. We truly have a once in a life time opportunity to address world wide tax fraud and identify that the sacrafices we are all making to contain the virus and not put stress on our health systems is also because our public health systems are underfunded and need better infrastructure which has not been able to happen because of tax fraud and tax evasion by multinational corporations, and in many cases government corruption (especially in more underdeveloped economies). People should not be losing their jobs and livelihoods because of unethical corporate fraud and government failure in allocation of taxation to health. This is wrong. Add on top of this there is both a corporate and government culture that avoids accountability at all cost. When was the last time a CEO, or government official opened themselves to criticism and came out and said, we fucked up! Never. This is also problematic. We need to change this culture and ALL accept criticism and admit when we are wrong.

I would also like to know how much Bill Gates pays in taxes in local economies. If he is in fact our unelected worldwide pandemic expert and leader, which apparently he is. He should know how important it is that local economies and nations invest in robust health infrastructure. If this is so important, he should also know how important it is for him to pay his taxes in those countries and oversee that this money is allocated to public health resources. If he hasn't and instead wants to privatise the remedy instead of funding prevention and infrastructure through health resources, then how can we really trust him? Wouldn't he be, in fact, part of the problem too? 

I don't think he is evil, like some right wing conspiracies say, but I do think there is a huge question around how we allow private enterprise to take control of public health, when private enterprise have a social and moral duty in taxation to invest in public infrastructure to handle things like pandemics and catastrophes that result in an overwhelmed health system. It is a big question in this moment, do we allow private enterprise to control our health systems, or do we empower government and keep it in the hands of the people. Maybe it is better for private enterprise to help because competition enables faster innovations, but the consequence of this is an inability to democratically criticise unethical business practices and empowering those who have wealth to have control over the health of populations. Which to me is more oligarchy than capitalism.

text:
Ôøº

¬†As explained in a previous update, the boards overseeing the COVID-19 vaccine clinical trials are supposed to be independent of pharmaceutical companies.¬† ICAN‚Äôs intensive investigation into these boards has revealed conflicts of interest with pharmaceutical companies that are shocking to the conscience.¬†¬†ICAN, through its attorneys, has therefore filed a¬†formal demand¬†to remove these individuals from these boards.¬†¬†

¬†

The FDA has now¬†responded¬†in a letter that fails to address any of these shocking conflicts and does not indicate it will take any action to rid these boards of pharmaceutical foot-soldiers. ¬†This response is a shocking indictment of the conflict-ridden judgment that will be relied upon to assess the safety and efficacy of any COVID-19 vaccine.

¬†

The boards overseeing the COVID-19 vaccine trials are known as Data and Safety Monitoring Boards (DSMBs).¬† As¬†explained¬†by pro-vaccine bioethicist, Art Caplan, regarding these DSMBs: ‚ÄúThey‚Äôre very powerful. They‚Äôre key guardians of science and safety and are as important if not more important than the FDA.‚Äù

¬†

There are four potential COVID-19 vaccines that are currently in Phase III clinical trials in the United States.¬† The clinical trials for three of these experimental vaccines ‚Äì the ones to be sold by AstraZeneca, Moderna, and Johnson & Johnson ‚Äì are being overseen by a DSMB created by Dr. Fauci‚Äôs National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases (the¬†NIAID DSMB).¬† The clinical trial for Pfizer‚Äôs experimental vaccine is being overseen by a different DSMB (the¬†Pfizer DSMB).¬†

¬†

The members of these DSMBs were selected in secret.¬† They meet in secret.¬† Their identities are supposed to remain a secret.¬† This veil of secrecy has held with the exception of two members.¬† The identity of the chairperson of the NIAID DSMB, Dr. Richard Whitley, was¬†mistakenly revealed¬†by his university in an announcement that has been scrubbed from its website.¬† As for the Pfizer DSMB, made up of five individuals, one of its members, Dr. Kathryn Edwards, was apparently¬†mistakenly revealed¬†in a CBS article.

¬†

Selecting these individuals could only occur by turning a blind eye to their extremely troubling and blatant conflicts with pharmaceutical companies.¬† For example, ICAN‚Äôs investigation has revealed that one or both of these doctors have been, among other things, consultants for¬†Gilead Science, AstraZeneca, GlaxoSmithKline, Merck, Sanofi, Sequirus, La Roche, Allergan,¬†Moderna, and Novartis;¬†¬†advisors to Merck, Bionet, GSK, and Pfizer; paid speakers for Connaught, Lederle-Praxis, Wyeth Lederle, Glaxo, and Novartis; paid millions of dollars from these companies; and, on the tab of these companies, wined-and-dined to hundreds of meals and taken dozens of trips to exotic destinations.¬† Meaning, they have had duties to these companies as consultants and advisors, have been personally financially supported by them, and have been their mouthpieces to the public. ¬†

¬†

Nonetheless, the American public is constantly assured by Dr. Fauci, Secretary Azar, and other public health officials that the DSMB members are independent of pharmaceutical companies.¬† For example, Dr. Fauci recently¬†told the public¬†that:¬†‚Äú[P]eople need to understand that¬†an independent body, the Data and Safety Monitoring Board, is¬†beholden to no one, not to the president,¬†not to the vaccine companies, not to the FDA. Not to me.‚Äù¬†

¬†

Only those wearing blinders could give Dr. Whitley and Dr. Edwards the label ‚Äúindependent.‚Äù¬† To head the ‚Äúindependent‚Äù DSMB, Dr. Fauci could have selected from a sea of potential scientists, many of whom have never consulted for a pharmaceutical company, were never on a pharmaceutical company speakers‚Äô bureau, and have not had hundreds of meals and dozens of exotic trips paid for by pharmaceutical companies.¬† Instead he chose Dr. Whitely as its head.¬† Dr. Fauci makes a mockery of the term ‚Äúindependent‚Äù and calls into serious question his judgment and objectivity.¬†

text:
As a child I used to view the WHO like the United Nations, beyond reproach.
In reply to Bill Gates, the Virus and the Quest to Vaccinate the World - https://www.nytimes.com/2020/11/23/world/bill-gates-vaccine-coronavirus.html?0p19G=0232

Robert F Kennedy Jr. Exposes Bill Gates' Vaccine Agenda In Scathing Report

Vaccines, for Bill Gates, are a strategic philanthropy that feed his many vaccine-related businesses (including Microsoft‚Äôs ambition to control a global vaccination ID enterprise) and give him dictatorial control of global health policy. Gates‚Äô obsession with vaccines seems to be fueled by a conviction to save the world with technology.

Promising his share of $450 million of $1.2 billion to eradicate Polio, Gates took control of India‚Äôs National Technical Advisory Group on Immunization (NTAGI) which mandated up to 50 doses (Table 1) of polio vaccines through overlapping immunization programs to children before the age of five. Indian doctors blame the Gates campaign for a devastating non-polio acute flaccid paralysis (NPAFP) epidemic that paralyzed 490,000 children beyond expected rates between 2000 and 2017. In 2017, the Indian government dialed back Gates‚Äô vaccine regimen and asked Gates and his vaccine policies to leave India. NPAFP rates dropped precipitously.

In 2017, the World Health Organization (WHO) reluctantly admitted that the global explosion in polio is predominantly vaccine strain. The most frightening epidemics in Congo, Afghanistan, and the Philippines, are all linked to vaccines. In fact, by 2018, 70% of global polio cases were vaccine strain.
[ZH: The CDC has a large financial interest in pushing untested vaccines on the public and WHO is even more under the control of Big Pharma. The organization is corrupt beyond the meaning of the word. ‚ÄúThe WHO is a sock puppet for the pharmaceutical industry.‚Äù ‚Äî Robert F. Kennedy Jr.]

During Gates‚Äô 2002 MenAfriVac campaign in Sub-Saharan Africa, Gates‚Äô operatives forcibly vaccinated thousands of African children against meningitis. Approximately 50 of the 500 children vaccinated developed paralysis.

South African newspapers complained, ‚ÄúWe are guinea pigs for the drug makers.‚Äù Nelson Mandela‚Äôs former Senior Economist, Professor Patrick Bond, describes Gates‚Äô philanthropic practices as ‚Äúruthless and immoral.‚Äù

In 2010, the Gates Foundation funded a phase 3 trial of GSK‚Äôs experimental malaria vaccine, killing 151 African infants and causing serious adverse effects including paralysis, seizure, and febrile convulsions to 1,048 of the 5,949 children.

In 2010, Gates committed $10 billion to the WHO saying, ‚ÄúWe must make this the decade of vaccines.‚Äù
A month later, Gates said in a Ted Talk that new vaccines ‚Äúcould reduce population‚Äù.

In 2014, Kenya‚Äôs Catholic Doctors Association accused the WHO of chemically sterilizing millions of unwilling Kenyan women with a ‚Äútetanus‚Äù vaccine campaign. Independent labs found a sterility formula in every vaccine tested. After denying the charges, WHO finally admitted it had been developing the sterility vaccines for over a decade. Similar accusations came from Tanzania, Nicaragua, Mexico, and the Philippines.

In 2014, the Gates Foundation funded tests of experimental HPV vaccines, developed by Glaxo Smith Kline (GSK) and Merck, on 23,000 young girls in remote Indian provinces. Approximately 1,200 suffered severe side effects, including autoimmune and fertility disorders. Seven died. Indian government investigations charged that Gates-funded researchers committed pervasive ethical violations: pressuring vulnerable village girls into the trial, bullying parents, forging consent forms, and refusing medical care to the injured girls. The case is now in the country‚Äôs Supreme Court.

A 2017 study (Morgenson et. al. 2017) showed that WHO‚Äôs popular DTP vaccine is killing more African children than the diseases it prevents. DTP-vaccinated girls suffered 10x the death rate of children who had not yet received the vaccine. WHO has refused to recall the lethal vaccine which it forces upon tens of millions of African children annually.

Global public health advocates around the world accuse Gates of steering WHO‚Äôs agenda away from the projects that are proven to curb infectious diseases: clean water, hygiene, nutrition, and economic development.
The Gates Foundation only spends about $650 million of its $5 billion dollar budget on these areas. 

They say he has diverted agency resources to serve his personal philosophy that good health only comes in a syringe.

In addition to using his philanthropy to control WHO, UNICEF, GAVI, and PATH, Gates funds a private pharmaceutical company that manufactures vaccines, and additionally is donating $50 million to 12 pharmaceutical companies to speed up development of a coronavirus vaccine.

In his recent media appearances, Gates appears confident that the Covid-19 crisis will now give him the opportunity to force his dictatorial vaccine programs on American children.

Vir: zerohedge.com, Robert F. Kennedy Jr., Chairman, Children‚Äôs Health Defense.

11/25/20 
'Why Are We Listening to Bill Gates?‚Äô - https://childrenshealthdefense.org/defender/why-are-we-listening-to-bill-gates/

Children's Health Defense Team

text:
As a child I used to view the WHO like the United Nations, beyond reproach.
In reply to Bill Gates, the Virus and the Quest to Vaccinate the World - https://www.nytimes.com/2020/11/23/world/bill-gates-vaccine-coronavirus.html?0p19G=0232

Robert F Kennedy Jr. Exposes Bill Gates' Vaccine Agenda In Scathing Report

Vaccines, for Bill Gates, are a strategic philanthropy that feed his many vaccine-related businesses (including Microsoft‚Äôs ambition to control a global vaccination ID enterprise) and give him dictatorial control of global health policy. Gates‚Äô obsession with vaccines seems to be fueled by a conviction to save the world with technology.

Promising his share of $450 million of $1.2 billion to eradicate Polio, Gates took control of India‚Äôs National Technical Advisory Group on Immunization (NTAGI) which mandated up to 50 doses (Table 1) of polio vaccines through overlapping immunization programs to children before the age of five. Indian doctors blame the Gates campaign for a devastating non-polio acute flaccid paralysis (NPAFP) epidemic that paralyzed 490,000 children beyond expected rates between 2000 and 2017. In 2017, the Indian government dialed back Gates‚Äô vaccine regimen and asked Gates and his vaccine policies to leave India. NPAFP rates dropped precipitously.

In 2017, the World Health Organization (WHO) reluctantly admitted that the global explosion in polio is predominantly vaccine strain. The most frightening epidemics in Congo, Afghanistan, and the Philippines, are all linked to vaccines. In fact, by 2018, 70% of global polio cases were vaccine strain.
[ZH: The CDC has a large financial interest in pushing untested vaccines on the public and WHO is even more under the control of Big Pharma. The organization is corrupt beyond the meaning of the word. ‚ÄúThe WHO is a sock puppet for the pharmaceutical industry.‚Äù ‚Äî Robert F. Kennedy Jr.]

During Gates‚Äô 2002 MenAfriVac campaign in Sub-Saharan Africa, Gates‚Äô operatives forcibly vaccinated thousands of African children against meningitis. Approximately 50 of the 500 children vaccinated developed paralysis.

South African newspapers complained, ‚ÄúWe are guinea pigs for the drug makers.‚Äù Nelson Mandela‚Äôs former Senior Economist, Professor Patrick Bond, describes Gates‚Äô philanthropic practices as ‚Äúruthless and immoral.‚Äù

In 2010, the Gates Foundation funded a phase 3 trial of GSK‚Äôs experimental malaria vaccine, killing 151 African infants and causing serious adverse effects including paralysis, seizure, and febrile convulsions to 1,048 of the 5,949 children.

In 2010, Gates committed $10 billion to the WHO saying, ‚ÄúWe must make this the decade of vaccines.‚Äù
A month later, Gates said in a Ted Talk that new vaccines ‚Äúcould reduce population‚Äù.

In 2014, Kenya‚Äôs Catholic Doctors Association accused the WHO of chemically sterilizing millions of unwilling Kenyan women with a ‚Äútetanus‚Äù vaccine campaign. Independent labs found a sterility formula in every vaccine tested. After denying the charges, WHO finally admitted it had been developing the sterility vaccines for over a decade. Similar accusations came from Tanzania, Nicaragua, Mexico, and the Philippines.

In 2014, the Gates Foundation funded tests of experimental HPV vaccines, developed by Glaxo Smith Kline (GSK) and Merck, on 23,000 young girls in remote Indian provinces. Approximately 1,200 suffered severe side effects, including autoimmune and fertility disorders. Seven died. Indian government investigations charged that Gates-funded researchers committed pervasive ethical violations: pressuring vulnerable village girls into the trial, bullying parents, forging consent forms, and refusing medical care to the injured girls. The case is now in the country‚Äôs Supreme Court.

A 2017 study (Morgenson et. al. 2017) showed that WHO‚Äôs popular DTP vaccine is killing more African children than the diseases it prevents. DTP-vaccinated girls suffered 10x the death rate of children who had not yet received the vaccine. WHO has refused to recall the lethal vaccine which it forces upon tens of millions of African children annually.

Global public health advocates around the world accuse Gates of steering WHO‚Äôs agenda away from the projects that are proven to curb infectious diseases: clean water, hygiene, nutrition, and economic development.
The Gates Foundation only spends about $650 million of its $5 billion dollar budget on these areas. 

They say he has diverted agency resources to serve his personal philosophy that good health only comes in a syringe.

In addition to using his philanthropy to control WHO, UNICEF, GAVI, and PATH, Gates funds a private pharmaceutical company that manufactures vaccines, and additionally is donating $50 million to 12 pharmaceutical companies to speed up development of a coronavirus vaccine.

In his recent media appearances, Gates appears confident that the Covid-19 crisis will now give him the opportunity to force his dictatorial vaccine programs on American children.

Vir: zerohedge.com, Robert F. Kennedy Jr., Chairman, Children‚Äôs Health Defense.

11/25/20 
'Why Are We Listening to Bill Gates?‚Äô - https://childrenshealthdefense.org/defender/why-are-we-listening-to-bill-gates/
By
Children's Health Defense Team

text:
Dear Trevor. Have been a fan of your work and comedy for many years, but to be honest I‚Äôm very disappointed that you missed an opportunity in this interview to ask some very legitimate questions re. concerns of these vaccines: 

- mRNA is an experimental technology and has never been used in Humans before. How can he be sure that it will be safe?
- We have been trying for 17 years (since SARs) to develop a Coronavirus vaccine, all other attempts failed at the animal testing, which we have now skipped in the interests of time. How can he be sure that we‚Äôve got it right this time? 
- The 90% success rate touted in the media was not based on any peer reviewed data from the clinical trials, it was taken from preliminary data and essentially used to bolster public confidence and raise the stock price (which is why the CEO of Pfizer sold 61% of his stock, the day the results were announced)
- None of the trials will show that taking the vaccine will prevent transmission to other people. I repeat, we cannot be sure that the vaccine will interrupt disease transmission. Surely this was a must-ask question?
- Is it not slightly disconcerting, that none of the manufactures will be held liable in the event of injuries suffered from any vaccines and this bill will be footed by the taxpayer?
- Given all these uncertainties, is it not worrying that certain governments have discussed mandating it? Or that certain professions will essentially coerce people into taking it? 

The world doesn‚Äôt need another Gates puff-piece, what we need is someone to be asking him these tough questions. I expected more from you and the Daily Show.

text: ¬†@Tahmid alpha12¬† Gates is the largest funder of the WHO today and that accounts for multiple countries combined. Nowhere in my statement did I say that WHO is only funded by Gates. Two recent examples just these past years: 1) A class action lawsuit against Purdue Pharma and it's associated doctors for overprescribing opioids and causing the opioid crisis in America due to financial pressure from the Sackler family. 2) Johnson and Johnson's scientists and executives lying for decades about their talc powder not causing cancer until the class action lawsuit revealed that they knew it all along. text:
¬†@Tahmid alpha12¬† You are such an idiot that you can't even bother to research basic facts about the organization that you defend and how it is funded: https://www.weforum.org/agenda/2020/04/who-funds-world-health-organization-un-coronavirus-pandemic-covid-trump/

author: abecore2000

text: ¬†@Tahmid alpha12¬† You keep obsessing about peer review when I never said anything about the accuracy of scientific papers. But let's talk about how a paper could be published. If I do  research where I find that after 40 days there is a negative side effect in some subjects but publish a paper saying that after 14 days, there were no negative side effects in any subjects, it is still true. I'm curious, how would a peer review handle this? Will they confirm the experiment or go beyond the timeframe listed on the paper?
author: abecore2000

text: ¬†@Tahmid alpha12¬† The effectiveness of a new pharmaceutical drug that has passed animal trials and is now being tested on humans. You could explain your own experiences or your colleagues who had to peer review a paper for a drug.
author: abecore2000

text: ¬†@Tahmid alpha12¬† I appreciate your input despite our differences. With the vaccine for covid, they had the vaccine group and the placebo group. They determine effectiveness by how many in the groups got sick but how can they control for external factors such as who gets exposed to covid and who doesn't? Wouldn't the effectiveness go down over time if more people in the vaccine group got covid six months from now? How do they know that the people who didn't get sick just haven't been exposed yet to covid?
author: abecore2000

text:
¬†@Tahmid alpha12¬† Once again, thanks for the lengthy response. My major concern about this vaccine is:

You said that the volunteers had an almost equal chance of getting covid but this is fundamentally impossible for a population sample this large. For example, if you and I live in California and we both volunteer for a trial but you go out once a week and I go out 4x a week for work, who has the greater chance of encountering covid? The BIGGEST problem is the length of time which is 5 months. The effectiveness of the vaccine was determined this quickly but let's say that they waited another 5 months and 120 from the vaccine group got sick and another 50 from the placebo group got sick making it 212 sick from placebo and 120 from vaccine group. This would make the effectiveness % of the vaccine go down. Probability theory works provided closed conditions such as your example of the coin being tossed in your hand. The coin has to land heads or tails and you control the number of tosses. You cannot compare a coin toss to people in the real world who may or may not come into contact with the virus depending on how often they go out, who they happen to meet via chance, where they happen to eat, run etc. In short, there are too many variables and too LITTLE TIME (5 months) to determine the efficacy of a vaccine when it involves people living their lives. Not to mention the possible side effects considering you yourself said it takes years of independent professionals looking for side effects years after the dose was taken. One more thing to consider is that the trial was conducted on healthy young people, not 65 + older people or people with medical conditions and those are the people who will be the first to line up and take these vaccines.
author: abecore2000

text: ¬†@Tahmid alpha12¬† Thank you for your time and the spirited discussion. You take care as well and I apologize for any harshness. Despite our differences, we all want the best for humanity and I will certainly be learning more as this unfolds. Take care and thanks again! üëç

But also, consider all that has been done by many governments to combat it in their countries. Human rights are being tampered with for the 'common good', as people are wearing masks, social distancing, closing businesses and restricting a form of normal life almost on a weekly base, for roughly 7 to 8 months now.

This is where this man made virus and vaccine come in. When certain health organizations in press conferences, are talking about entering your home, to take away your children, for the common good, I have a problem with that. All I'm saying, is that we need to investigate and report these things, which the media is not. There are videos and small news websites with articles on this matter.

Mr Rothschild Says:
1.	Mr. Rothschild Says 
‚ÄúAn illusion it will be, so large, so vast it will escape their perception. Those who will see it will be thought of as insane. We will create separate fronts to prevent them from seeing the connection between us. We will behave as if we are not connected to keep the illusion alive.
Our goal will be accomplished one drop at a time so as to never bring suspicion upon ourselves. This will also prevent them from seeing the changes as they occur.
‚ÄúWe will always stand above the relative field of their experience for we know the secrets of the absolute. We will work together always and will remain bound by blood and secrecy. Death will come to he who speaks.
‚ÄúWe will keep their lifespan short and their minds weak while pretending to do the opposite. We will use our knowledge of science and technology in subtle ways so they will never see what is happening.
We will use soft metals, aging accelerators and sedatives in food and water, also in the air. They will be blanketed by poisons everywhere they turn. The soft metals will cause them to lose their minds. We will promise to find a cure from our many fronts, yet we will feed them more poison.
The poisons will be absorbed through their skin and mouths, they will destroy their minds and reproductive systems. From all this, their children will be born dead, and we will conceal this information. The poisons will be hidden in everything that surrounds them, in what they drink, eat, breathe and wear.
We must be ingenious in dispensing the poisons for they can see far. We will teach them that the poisons are good, with fun images and musical tones. Those they look up to will help. We will enlist them to push our poisons.
‚ÄúThey will see our products being used in film and will grow accustomed to them and will never know their true effect. When they give birth we will inject poisons into the blood of their children and convince them its for their help. We will start early on, when their minds are young, we will target their children with what children love most, sweet things.
When their teeth decay we will fill them with metals that will kill their mind and steal their future. When their ability to learn has been affected, we will create medicine that will make them sicker and cause other diseases for which we will create yet more medicine. We will render them docile and weak before us by our power. They will grow depressed, slow and obese, and when they come to us for help, we will give them more poison.
‚ÄúWe will focus their attention toward money and material goods so they many never connect with their inner self. We will distract them with fornication, external pleasures and games so they may never be one with the oneness of it all. Their minds will belong to us and they will do as we say.
If they refuse we shall find ways to implement mind-altering technology into their lives. We will use fear as our weapon. We will establish their governments and establish opposites within.
We will own both sides.
We will always hide our objective but carry out our plan. They will perform the labor for us and we shall prosper from their toil.
‚ÄúOur families will never mix with theirs. Our blood must be pure always, for it is the way.
We will make them kill each other when it suits us. We will keep them separated from the oneness by dogma and religion. We will control all aspects of their lives and tell them what to think and how.
We will guide them kindly and gently letting them think they are guiding themselves. We will foment animosity between them through our factions. When a light shall shine among them, we shall extinguish it by ridicule, or death, whichever suits us best. We will make them rip each other‚Äôs hearts apart and kill their own children. We will accomplish this by using hate as our ally, anger as our friend. The hate will blind them totally, and never shall they see that from their conflicts we emerge as their rulers. They will be busy killing each other. They will bathe in their own blood and kill their neighbors for as long as we see fit.
‚ÄúWe will benefit greatly from this, for they will not see us, for they cannot see us. We will continue to prosper from their wars and their deaths.
We shall repeat this over and over until our ultimate goal is accomplished.
We will continue to make them live in fear and anger though images and sounds. We will use all the tools we have to accomplish this. The tools will be provided by their labor. We will make them hate themselves and their neighbors.
‚ÄúWe will always hide the divine truth from them, that we are all one. This they must never know!
They must never know that color is an illusion, they must always think they are not equal. Drop by drop, drop by drop we will advance our goal. We will take over their land, resources and wealth to exercise total control over them.
We will deceive them into accepting laws that will steal the little freedom they will have. We will establish a money system that will imprison them forever, keeping them and their children in debt.
‚ÄúWhen they shall ban together, we shall accuse them of crimes and present a different story to the world for we shall own all the media.
We will use our media to control the flow of information and their sentiment in our favor. When they shall rise up against us we will crush them like insects, for they are less than that. They will be helpless to do anything for they will have no weapons.
‚ÄúWe will recruit some of their own to carry out our plans, we will promise them eternal life, but eternal life they will never have for they are not of us. The recruits will be called ‚Äúinitiates‚Äù and will be indoctrinated to believe false rites of passage to higher realms. Members of these groups will think they are one with us never knowing the truth.
They must never learn this truth for they will turn against us.
For their work they will be rewarded with earthly things and great titles, but never will they become immortal and join us, never will they receive the light and travel the stars. They will never reach the higher realms, for the killing of their own kind will prevent passage to the realm of enlightenment.
This they will never know. The truth will be hidden in their face, so close they will not be able to focus on it until its too late. Oh yes, so grand the illusion of freedom will be, that they will never know they are our slaves.
‚ÄúWhen all is in place, the reality we will have created for them will own them. This reality will be their prison. They will live in self-delusion. When our goal is accomplished a new era of domination will begin. Their minds will be bound by their beliefs, the beliefs we have established from time immemorial.
‚ÄúBut if they ever find out they are our equal, we shall perish then. THIS THEY MUST NEVER KNOW.
If they ever find out that together they can vanquish us, they will take action.
They must never, ever find out what we have done, for if they do, we shall have no place to run, for it will be easy to see who we are once the veil has fallen. Our actions will have revealed who we are and they will hunt us down and no person shall give us shelter.
‚ÄúThis is the secret covenant by which we shall live the rest of our present and future lives, for this reality will transcend many generations and life spans.
This covenant is sealed by blood, our blood. We, the ones who from heaven to earth came.‚Äù
‚ÄúThis covenant must NEVER, EVER be known to exist.
It must NEVER, EVER be written or spoken of for if it is, the consciousness it will spawn will release the fury of the PRIME CREATOR upon us and we shall be cast to the depths from whence we came and remain there until the end time of infinity itself.‚Äù

Putting off the fact that we don't know enough about how the brain functions to do anything significant (besides removing tumors and prescribing drugs to help balance chemicals that get to it from the blood stream. We can't even adequately explain memory. It's pretty much just a "this part of the brain controls these things...but we don't know exactly how, apart from electrical signals and chemicals" thing at this point), or the fact that technology isn't far enough along to allow a tiny electrical device ("microchip" is a dumb-person's term to mean "anything that I don't understand, but seems technologically advanced in a small package." In the real world, a microchip can't do anything on its own, is "micro" only in the relative sense compared to older technologies when you had refrigerator-sized computers, and isn't magical or mystical in making it possible to do anything just by existing in a space) to control the brain or body for reasons just explained about our lack of understanding of the brain...it's still a nonsensical conspiracy theory. Mind control via circuits so small that they fit in a needle is stupid to believe in for a variety of reasons, and the best we can accomplish is tracking your position for a matter of a few hours to a few days due to battery (and capacitor) constraints, as well as the inability to turn common sci-fi go-to sources of power (thermal, chemical, kinetic) into actual electrical energy at that scale.
Like I said. Why would he bother? It's a stupid conspiracy theory that can't be logically and reasonably (and technologically) supported, nor can it be scientifically supported at this time, so it would be a massive waste of time to try when the interview has a time limit. In short, we're advanced, but nowhere near that advanced in all of the relevant fields (our understanding of the human brain, the tech to control a human body by subverting brain processes, the tech to do that on the nanometer scale, the tech to power such devices for that purpose for longer than a minute or two, etc).

6:30 well mr. Gates, I am a biologist and to me its not realy complicated. I am not a conspiracy nut but I would like to know the answers to 3 questions that might make it easier to understand for the rest:
1. How offten does it happen that a virus jumps for one species to a completly different one?
2. How offten does it happen several times in a row, ending up in humans?
3. Where does the polybasic furin cleavage site (PRRA) come from? 

For those who are not biologists: mutatons dont happen like this. For a virus to jump species it takes a lot of luck and favorable mutations. For a virus to jump several species in a single year is next to impossible. But the most important is question 3. The PRRA could not have mutated naturaly since its comprised of 4 alels that just dont mutate together. This is in genetics called a "caset insert" and was 99% likely done in a lab. So we have to ask ourselves: why do some people do gain of function reaserch? Who pays for it and what is it for?

text: As a civil engineer who has for decades worked on sea level rise & storm modeling (coastal events like hurricanes & nor'easters plus typical rainfall intensity/ flooding) from an infrastructure design standpoint (ie how much floodproofing / what wind speed to design bldg's for / etc),  I can postulate that it's actually TOO FUCKIN' LATE!!!!! Climate change is upon us & it's getting far more drastic every year.  All these wildfires, more frequent & intense & unpredictable hurricanes, sea level rise in a decade that took 100+ years previously, ice sheets melting, coral dying, etc, etc, etc.  Note that climate change has "Inertia" - much like the seasons "drag" (summer & winter happen mainly after each Solstice), so the climate change we are experiencing now is probably from the greenhouse gases emitted decades / a century ago.  This is pretty difficult for science to even attempt to model but many I've talked to (I experience this issue from the Engineering side) privately concede it to be a plausible reality.  So batten down the hatches, don't buy any real estate near the coast or in the woods out west . . . I mean, I'm glad to see Bill being optimistic but I don't share his optimism . . .

author: Phillip Cordero

text:
¬†@Aleksey¬† Thanks for linking the video! I watched the whole thing and cause I have a lot of time and think this kind of stuff is important I wrote this little essay about it if you want to hear my thoughts :).

The first 5 minutes are an interesting look on how his public perception has changed over the years. This intro to the video is dedicated to showing how he was hated in the 90s due to his monopoly on web browsers (he made it so every windows machine came preloaded with internet explorer stifling the competition) and how he acted douchey during questioning which is all true but I think is a stretch to call evil. 

The next 5 minutes show parallels between Rockefeller and Gates, and insinuating that by spending millions on PR and media partnerships he must be hiding something, though Corbett doesn‚Äôt explain what. Corbett shows the various media organizations that Gates, more specifically the Bill and Melinda Gates foundation, donates to. They all are global health related and very much in tune with the foundation‚Äôs proposed goals.

By halfway through the video all Corbett has said is that Gates is an extremely rich man who pours a lot of money into global health initiatives. His tone is accusatory and hostile yet nothing he has said as been even slightly damning. You could literally keep the same script and change the tone of voice and this section of the video could be a complimentary piece on Gates haha.

He then starts talking about Covid. A novel disease in which very little was known about at the start and which early models showed a much higher risk and mortality than we may now think. He says Fauci, an immunologist, is echoing Gates‚Äô assertion that a vaccine needs to be found before going completely back to normal. But I have to wonder, isn‚Äôt it more likely that Gates, a programmer and entrepreneur, is echoing the statements of the experts in this field?

Last part of the video is about how what they do in the developing world which although seems philanthropic is actually part of a long term plan to corner the market in these areas. He doesn't explain how this could happen or any evidence of this happening but as proof he shows how Gates net worth has doubled over the last 10 years, a surprising fact for sure, but I think can still be explained by investing his billions of dollars intelligently.

I agree that the fact that one man can have so much money is scary. But I ask you what does this video accuse Gates of doing? Funding world health initiatives? Being a major player in the production and distribution of vaccines? Doing exactly what Gates says he‚Äôs doing? I guess if you believe vaccines are dangerous then this might scare you. I mean as someone who hates needles the amount of times a clip of someone being injected with a syringe in this video made it hard to watch. But ultimately my opinion of Gates is unchanged. He‚Äôs an extremely and unfairly rich man who now, like billionaires before him, uses a lot of his money to fund global health projects. Despite this he does not have direct control over any of the organizations he donates to, he does not work in government, and he is a large contributor to the WHO but is not in a position to change laws or government policies. His vast wealth gives him a huge influence, that is the world we live in, but until I see real harm being done I have to remain indifferent.

Thanks for reading if you did, youtube comments aren‚Äôt really meant for this sort of thing haha. If you read my whole thing I'd love to hear what you think.

text: Social Media is both the most phenomenal technological development in human history,  on par with the invention of the internet itself as well as the other telecommunication evolution; and unfortunately, since Social Media is a relatively recent development we (as a species) do not yet fully understand the consequences of the use of such instant and extensive methods of communication.  Propaganda has always been useful to the enrichment of those in power politically and through the offices of a given religion. Unfortunately, the internet offers this same ability to disseminate faulty information for their own benefit. All we can do is make every effort to explore the source of any information that includes an emotional or distorted message that appears to influence transient decision making versus calm and deliberate examination of all known facts. If we fail in this brake on the spread of rumor the internet contains an element of profound cognitive processing evolution that could and likely will lead to the downfall of our civilization.

text:
''Psychology researchers David Dunning and Justin Kruger at Cornell University published a seminal paper entitled ‚ÄúUnskilled and Unaware of It: How Difficulties in Recognizing One‚Äôs Own Incompetence Lead to Inflated Self-Assessments.‚Äù They demonstrated a horrific truth of the human condition: people who are very bad at a thing can nevertheless form the delusion that they are really good at it. To put it another way, stupid people have no difficulty in imagining they are smart.‚Äù 

''The world of conspiracy theories is one where stupid people dismiss the expertise of highly qualified people, and attribute to these experts a wicked desire to lie to and gull the masses. 
In other words, they portray experts as sinister enemies of the people. Conspiracy theories reflect the increasingly prevalent notion that the average, uneducated person is always right ‚Äì can always see the real truth of a situation ‚Äì while the educated experts are always wrong because they are deliberately lying to the people to further a conspiracy by the elite against the people. It is increasingly being perceived as a ‚Äúsin‚Äù, a crime, to be smart, to be an expert.‚Äù 

From the book: Dumbocalypse Now: The First Dunning-Kruger President by Joe Dixon

text:
¬†@Dream the Noob Version¬† 
Not interested to get into an argument with you but if you are really asking, here is my answer to your question.
It is always good to use your head and think for yourself. To do it well means working with rational and nuanced ideas. This is particularly important for topics where you have no direct experience and cannot verify for yourself.

For example, if you want to know more about vaccines, ask your doctor next time you go, he is very likely to give you a rational and nuanced answer. This answer is not just his opinion, it is based on his studies at medical school which are based on evidence (rationality) collected by thousands of other doctors.  His answer will, most likely, be correct. His answer will most likely also be nuanced, he will not tell you that vaccines are good or bad but he will comment their proved efficiency and history.

A conspiracy theory is finding an answer that although may sound logical to you, is based on false premises by ill-informed people, not nuanced at all and very very unlikely. For example, a theory that requires that thousands of people manage to keep an evil plan secret is not very likely.

¬†@Mazike¬†  thank you very much for your honesty. I think you're absolutely right about people being afraid of change no matter which side of the fence one is on. I do think it's really important though that the President of the United States sets a good tone for the rest of the world because it makes everyone feel safer when America is strong and stable. In spite of his support base at home Trump was undermining America's power and your country sadly has become the laughing stock of the world. This does not send out a good message to other countries who may wish harm upon others. Trump made it appear that a president can do anything - as he himself said "I could shoot someone on 5th Ave and not lose voters" - and get away with it.
It's really important for the world that America gets back on track. Not a radical left or radical right. Just decency and commonsense. Covid needs to be brought under control so that the economy can recover and businesses can reopen. The next President is nowhere near as charismatic as Trump but at least he's experienced. He's also moderate so hopefully things will calm down. Trump has been entertaining but America and the world needs an American President who will look out for everyone not just those who support him. I actually wish the best for America. I've visited there twice and had the best time. I wish you the best.
author: Penelope Collett

text: ¬†@Penelope Collett¬† I agree completely. Trump has brought to light how divided america really is. We already knew people were heavily partisan, but to see the fanaticism that bloomed when the president encourage the worst behaviors was truly horrible. It also showed what happens when someone completely incompetent is in charge and how dangerous the reach of the United States president is. Hopefully we can rebuild our world image and diplomatic relationships, but I think it would be better if the US wasn't as domineering as it has been for some time. Just because we are a large country with international influence doesn't mean we should continue to seek solutions through our vastly over budget military. We really need to learn through humility, which has never been our strong suit in the States. At the moment arrogance has prevailed, and ignorance has made the perfect environment for a pandemic to go largely unfettered.
author: Mazike

text:
¬†@Mazike¬†   the people of America have certainly spoken. Both sides. Sadly Americans no longer respect their differences because Pres 45 has encouraged that - thinking it would keep him in power forever.
Actually what concerns me most is the conspiracy theories. There are some crazy people on social media these days believing and perpetrating the absolute worst of human nature. Another 4 years would have been catastrophic to be honest. 
I agree with you about America not getting involved in wars though. I think lessons were learned with Afghanistan and Iraq but unfortunately that has resulted in long-term instability (terrorism) in the Middle East which has to be managed as long as it's necessary. 
However, this pandemic has shook the world - except for one person with a lot of influence unfortunately. My point being it has shook the world to the point that I don't think anyone has the appetite for foreign wars and that will last for some time I think. 
But the relentless tweets and resulting media coverage and chaos in the US government in recent years has affected the entire world. I cannot tell you how we all feel so exhausted by what has been going on. Not just me. Everyone I know in my country and family in other countries - everyone has been consumed by it. Another country's politics - especially one as important as the US, should not be doing this. It destabilises the world and it's dangerous.
I see there may hopefully be a plan by the new dispensation to roll out home testing which would be amazing for America because of the huge scepticism there against vaccines. If people could test themselves regularly and quarantine if they test positive would be a huge step forward. 
In my country it's mandatory to wear masks and social distance and I must say everyone is very good. We literally are not allowed into stores without a mask on or using hand sanitiser. This makes everyone feel safer and it's effective so I'm happy. Short term solutions for long term gain. We can only hope everything will calm down soon. 
It's late here now so I thank you for the chat and bid you a good night and stay safe :)

text:
About the why-motivation-for conspiracy-theories point:
I get a feeling that it's emotional deflection. You decouple your fear and helplessness by projecting it on some theory/story/narrative that has a clear antagonist/culprit/villain against which the individual can position itself as the hero. This alone is a motivation. Plus, being active/staging one's struggle in the fight against the villain is a self-affirmative performance of empowerment, which helps to bear/reduce the feeling of helplessness.

Corona is a hard-to-grasp, global threat to physical health, economic security and more. At the same time, the best one can do to help fight it is to stay at home and keep physical distance. That's not what the hero does to fight the villain, right? That's not what the movies show, etc...

So my sense is that a lot of the motivation why people spend hours (!!) scrambling through the web, looking for puzzle pieces to ridiculous theories and go on the street is that they want to distract themselves from a feeling of helplessness.

And here's the thing, if somebody comes to me and tells me they feel fearful and helpless about their situation, I'm not gonna turn away and not listen. It's totally understandable. But if someone comes and tells me this is all a conspiracy, cooked up by elites to chip my brain and drink baby blood, that's so bonkers and beyond the point that I can hardly meet those people with empathy or understanding. Which is what they crave. So tragically, as they find no ear among close friends/relatives/colleagues/etc., these people are at risk of isolating themselves - which makes social platforms, chat groups and social gatherings of seemingly like-minded folks even more appealing.

Edit: btw, I think this general description can apply widely to people across the political spectrum since every individual is subject to cognitive biases/blind spots and can buy into conspiracy theories.This is a risk to relationships in all social settings but the special risk with regard to the coronavirus situation is that mingling with people at demonstrations during this pandemic is very counterproductive to fighting the infection spread.

I am no conspiracy theorist, but surely if your goal is to allay fears about the vaccines, you need to go into the development and testing that was done on these vaccines, and whether fast-tracking and political pressures could compromise their safety and efficacy.

Global warming will not cause the "world" to disappear. author: Josie Amaya

text:
¬†@Josie Amaya¬† I disagree. Having studied at least some of the topic out of interest a few years back, @Emma Clare Maxwell brings up some valid points. The hazards of GMOs to things like pest development (making them more resistant to natural pesticides, for instance) aren't really being looked at too hard, though some are known and downplayed intentionally. Soil quality isn't an issue when it comes to GMOs, but agricultural practices do impact it, and those are often enough influenced by both political and economic pressures (grow more crops because the prices are going down, making it harder to make a living, forcing farmers even in the U.S. to be more intensive in their practices, which in turn degrades the soil and threatens water supplies. Right now, India is trying to convince its populace to eat more sugar so that its sugar industry doesn't go under, and the industry is already heavily subsidized by their government). Monocropping has been known to be bad for at least two thousand years ("De Agri Cultura" is a series of books written by Varro and Cato, two very prominent figures in ancient Rome from before the fall of the Republic. The title literally translates to "About Farming," and have guided farming practices ever since; I have a copy of the set, with both the original Latin text and English translation, though they are dry reads unless you're really interested, containing explanations, descriptions, and some story-telling. Crop rotation is one of the widely agreed-upon practices that they and countless others since have verified as a method for mitigating pest threats, and as you read more scientific literature on the subject, you understand why), but the U.S. started doing it because of growing populations and world wars, and despite thousands of years of "this is bad, don't do it," as well as more modern "this is happening because you decided to do it anyway," we decided to just keep on going, and that has resulted in massive soil degradation, toxic water and dangerous algae blooms, and the need to deal with pests with stronger and stronger resistances to natural pest deterrents and killers (GMOs incorporate naturally occurring pesticides to kill the pests that eat them, and while anti-GMO pushers rant about "exploding stomachs," they are, so far as anyone has been able to tell, perfectly safe for human consumption...but the pests that survive reproduce, making more resistant strains).
Now, I can't speak for what Gates himself has done or promoted, but I can say that we have problems that need to be addressed, and the person you bash as having a negative IQ brings up some of them. So rather than just insulting someone, please at least respond to them with valid arguments that draw from legitimate science, policy consequences, etc. Seeing as how I am rather ignorant on what Bill Gates has actually done in that regard, it would have been worth reading (and fact checking).

text:
The human mind is conservative by nature, and will usually cling on to "what was" because "better the devil you know..."..

But here is the problem: Without change progress isn't possible.

The problem with this is that it literally is a bullshit argument. Kodak invented the digital camera first but decided to not go for it because their business model was based on selling film.

The same problem with the Oil industry. They ONLY know oil, and as long as they can they will pump it and protect the concept at all costs. EVEN if them ABANDONING that mindset would actually mean they could've been in a head start on becoming the entrepreneurs that will be the ones who wins the most out of BETTER solutions.

Whenever Big Oil lobbies against subsidies or grants for developing cleaner power, I just think about how they are chosing the stupid route, they should not PREVENT it. Even WITHOUT Climate change, oil IS a business destined to die SOMETIME.. (it IS a limited resource, even if it is possible to squeeze some more toothpaste out of that tube, we NEVER get MORE of it)... So what they SHOULD do is to not be fucking stupid (technical term), and instead say.. "OOoooh.. there are ways for us to invest in developing something that HAS to come at some point in the futurer  AND not have to pay the full cost of the development, while reaping ALL the benefits, and if we use the power, influence and other resources we have.. We should EASILY have the opportunity to be ahead in the game".

When I was about 15, I did a school project where I tried to do the maths looking at the estimations on how much crude oil that was left that we could access, compared to how much gas is used in cars, and how fast people started owning more and more cars pr capita, AND how fast the population seemed to be rising. I extrapolated it to.. around the mid 2020s.. so.. about when I turn 50. 

Some of my extrapolations turned out wrong (No, I wasn't a lazy researcher, I mentioned the caveats of trying to predict the future, and that extrapolating data is never really "right").. 

Examples on things that have moved that time line..

Better fuel efficiency HAS reduced the usage.. but if that was the only thing.. it would barely survive to my retirement..

We HAVE switched SOME things to alternative power usage.. fair enough: Until I am dead, and I assume "That will happen after I am dead and gone" is good enough for corporate men, they live egocentrically, and five years at a time, they won't care if it happens to their children.

New fields HAVE been discovered, but if we ignore those.. Well.. The "easy to relate to reference frame" is over now.. also I never seen the figures on guesses on how much those specific pockets contain.. 

Then we have learned to extract oil from places that before was deemed immoral, and stupid because you harm more than you get out.. known as "fracking".. But then again; I don't care how little science you know and how much you care more about whether you feel comforted and convinced, than actually have tried to figure out what IS right, AND what is most reasonable choice to make CONSIDERING that no matter what you believe.. the truth will be the truth (that is why this isn't a matter of belief; Either you make a GOOD job to try to find out what the truth is, or you make a BAD job.. and either way.. in the end the truth WILL be the truth)...... No one can KNOW an ultimate and UNQUESTIONABLE truth.. but.. probability is that Global warming is right..

and if we not only ignore it, but start fracking until we have extrapolated every last drop of oil that even exist.. BEFORE giving up on preventing competition.. Global warming WILL be real, AND we have literally ruined the earth by our own actions EVEN if Global warming STILL wouldn't have been so.



¬π Examples: Better Fuel efficiency, modern methods of extracting it where it used to be considered foolish..

The average worker pays 15% over all of his/her earnings for Single coverage Healthcare 
12% benefited to the employee by the Employer for Single coverage at 82% coverage on average
03% cost out of pocket covered by the employee for Single coverage at 18% earnings cost on average

The average worker pays 42% of his/her earnings for Family coverage Healthcare
25.5% benefited to employee by the Employer Family coverage at 61% coverage on average
16.5% cost out of pocket covered by the employee Family coverage at 39% earnings cost on average

Average cost to an Employer for single coverage of a group of employees is 2/3 a given value.
If you no longer have to pay out of pocket. You get 3% of your check back.
If Employer must pay you the value of what your single payer was valued in wages, you get 12% back.

That he made money off of giving you rather than in wages.

Leaving you a massive 23.5% more still left in your check on average, if you had family coverage!(explained below)
You get paid and get better healthcare. To go with that free collage degree leading to better job security.
While never paying a co-pay, or deductible again. Plus never needing to worry about falling in a prescription doughnut hole.

If you already had a family plan(you still would just get 12% back or single coverage back from company)

16.5% Plus 12% single value back, minus 5% = 23.5% more in your check still.

text: hi there, non american here, maybe i can give an perspective unbiased to US politics. the survival rate varies from country to country and is heavily dependent on the country's response and healthcare capacity. for eg, the death rate for the US is significantly higher than Singapore, but regardless it is also significantly more deadly than your common flu. the danger with covid is not just the death rate and the long-term health consequences (even for young, healthy folk), but also how quickly, easily and widely it spreads. then, even with a small death rate, the number of deaths will still be HUGE. and with increased absolute number of cases requiring medical attention at hospitals, the overcapacity then contributes further to higher death rates. this perpetuates the cycle of increased severity (eg. more cases --> overcapacity at hospitals --> worsening care and higher death rate --> more deaths). a reason why a country like singapore may have a much lower infection and death rate per capita is because of preventive measure like mask wearing, social distancing, contact tracing etc which are tried and tested methods that have been used in countless pandemics before this for many years. :-) the rest of the world does want the US to deal with their situation quickly for the sake of the people, and the global economy too, regardless of whether a dem or a rep is in charge

text: ¬†@OG Sky Watch¬† The Gates Foundation is not "run" by Melinda Gates (nice lady), I'd say Bill has more say than anyone.  The Gates Foundation has in fact funded vaccine development and deployment (several in fact).  Vaccine cold chains are hard (some can be frozen, some can't be frozen, some have to be in a specific temperature range), but not super hard (we have entire logistics systems from production labs to solar powered ice pack lined freezers all the way down to little ice boxes for field adminstration developed specifically for that).
author: Yoon H. Kim

text:
¬†@Politrix As Usual¬† The sterile children is a bunch of bunk and never happened.  I happen to have been in Nigeria when those rumors were floating around and knew the WHO doctor in charge of trying to eradicate it there as one of the last pockets of polio.  I also knew the head state epidemiologist of the Islamic northern Nigerian states and we used to talk about this "recalcitrant nonsense" as he'd put it.  I was there are the time working on a mass vaccination campaign for a simultaneous outbreak of measles and meningitis.  More the latter for me since another chick was working on the measles.  

Everywhere I had to deal with vaccination fatigue.  That's when the local leaders are like, "Yo, we just lined up to get poked or dosed for some disease or another, give us a break."  And then I'd say, "This is where all of the disease comes to hide because your people don't want to stand in line for a couple hours.  How many diseases are there in the world?  How many diseases do you think there are that there is a shot to protect you against it?  2?  5? 10?  For now, we have this one for this outbreak that is killing people today.   Soon, there will will come a day when a killer will come and everyone is dying and there will be no shot to protect you.  Save your apathy for that one.  Today, get your people to stand in line for a day."

Everywhere I'd go, I'd ask about the details of the polio vaccine schedule and sites.  I mean, why go to all the trouble of site planning and crowd control (we can do 20,000 vaccinations in a day when things are well organized - easily) when WHO already might have done most of the work during a prior mass vacc.  If any one of those religious or government leaders could have produced a single child with a medically confirmable side effect, they'd have produced them then because boy do these dudes love to complain.  Why would they trust me?  Because they're not fucking stupid.  We're not the WHO and we're a body that everyone trusts, even the naturally suspicious dwellers of the sub-Saharan scrub Sahel.  If we caught word of some crazy shit like that, it'd be all over world media in a fucking heartbeat.

Now, Oral Polio Vaccine (OPV) derived vaccine is a known risk, one that is factored into the risk assessment for a given population at the time of administration.  Vaccine Derived Polio does not infect the kid who was given the vaccine.  It affects the kid who come in contact with the excreta of someone who has had OPV during a short window of time after vaccination only among a very small proportion of the population.  That's a matter of poor sanitation and tragically preventable on two fronts - no one should have to live in those kind of sanitation conditions (I often have and it sucks) and we can use Intravenous Polio Vaccine (IPV) which doesn't have that problem.  OPV was used for any number of reasons, but most of them are for technical and cultural reasons and have NOTHING to do will Bill Gates.

I have no love of Bill Gates.  I spent most of the 90s hating his fucking guts.  He was number 2 on my dudes I want to punch list.  But I got I over it.  Bill Gates is the bogeyman of global health for no particular reason other than conspiracy theorists need someone to rub one against and he's the face.  Bill don't care.  He's got too much cheddar to give two shits.
